original_text: And if they blow but with one trumpet, then the princes, which are heads of the thousands of Israel, shall gather themselves unto thee.
korean_text: 하나만 불 때에는 이스라엘의 천부장 된 지휘관들이 모여서 네게로 나아올 것이며

sentences.original_text: And if they blow but with one trumpet
which are heads of the thousands of Israel
